[Air Gear] Past1 year ago in Paintings
0 Comments
More Like This

Remote controlA man has fallen... His wheels have stopped whirling around, his thump has been heard all over, his torment is burning from now on. His dullness has been cast aside, finally. I was listening, And you? I was feeling everything Pain Regrets Pride, what a stupid thing! But a new, winding path he has traced before himself And before me too, because I listened to him and I felt it. But in a second, all has gone down The press of a button and everything is over. His voice replaced by bellows and whinnies and a sly laugh at my ears... Stop, STOP, NOW!!! Enough with you, men of faith and ethics! Enough with your hypocrisy and your fucking humour! You feel pity for someone who has no more a house and yet you can't find compassion for someone who's lost his life. It is true, so: You're good only when the world allows you to be. For what concerns me, the only thing I've in common with you is only in our speciesRemote control1 year ago in Free Verse
